channel.title: Trade Limit? HELP PLEASE!
channel.description:
Okay, I just recently changed switched over my client and source and I had my staff come over to beta test and when I wanted to give a administrator there was a no trade for him. Then I made him a user and when I wanted to give him items it wouldn't let me give him...
Okay so I want to get rid of the trade limit it's base is "Project Insanity". Does anyone know how to get rid of this??

item.title: Trade Limit? HELP PLEASE!
item.dc:creator: @Tozeo Tozeo
item.description:
@Tozeo wrote:

http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/294541-pi-new-trade-screen-wealth-transfer-total-offer-item-value-dupes-fixed.html (R-S) Basically, just undo this.

Read full topic

item.title: Trade Limit? HELP PLEASE!
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“frozon566, post:4, topic:427833”]I believe its in config.java where all the constants are, its something like

ADMINS_CAN_TRADE = false;

change it to true.[/quote]
He’s asking about trade limit not if admins can trade.

Read full topic

item.title: Trade Limit? HELP PLEASE!
item.dc:creator: @frozon566 frozon566
item.description:
@frozon566 wrote:

I believe its in config.java where all the constants are, its something like

ADMINS_CAN_TRADE = false;

change it to true.
